org.ingatan.component.quiztime
Class QuizSettingsDialog

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Dialog
                  javax.swing.JDialog
                      org.ingatan.component.quiztime.QuizSettingsDialog
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class QuizSettingsDialog
extends javax.swing.JDialog

This dialog is shown when the user selects the quiz option from the main menu. It allows the user to set which libraries should be included for that particular quiz.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Thomas Everingham
See Also:
Serialized Form
